title: Thanks, @DoughBoyRifa - The GameOverGreggy Show
description:
Marco (http://www.twitter.com/doughboyrifa) has been baller and supporting Kinda Funny on http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny at the Thank You video tier for three months. Here's our love letter to him.

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Buy our shirts! http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Each and every Friday, Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, Nick Scarpino, and Tim Gettys get together to talk. Each podcaster brings a topic to the table, and then, they go. TV, space, books, movies -- anything goes.

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys

I corrected the following:

* "oldfashioned" to "an old-fashioned"
* Added apostrophe to "they'd"
* Capitalized "YouTube" and added "com/" to the URL
* Corrected "Follow the Leader it is not definitely not but you God I would have been what the well" to a more coherent sentence, assuming it was a fragment of a quote or a phrase that was being referenced. The original text seemed to be referencing a YouTube video title.
* Capitalized "Nick Scarpino"
* Corrected minor spelling and grammar errors throughout the chunk.
